name: We Are The Hero (Brackeys 2021.1 Submission)
description:
We Are The Hero!

-------------------------------

Controls:

Click on your attacks to deal damage!

(Hint: 'Attack!' deals damage equal to your total number of fans!)

Collect rewards to become stronger!

Every 3 combats you will enter the item shop. Select your move and the move you would like to purchase to see the cost to swap! Click buy to complete the purchase.

Try to get to survive 20 rounds to prove yourself as the Hero of the People!
